entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who is struggling with the task of jinxing Ron. He has his wand raised and is waiting to repel a jinx.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a student who is supposed to be jinxing Harry but is struggling with the task.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as a teacher who is watching Harry and Ron struggle with the task. He turns his wand on Harry and knocks him off-balance.

relationships.description: Snape's non-verbal spell knocks Harry off-balance, causing him to hit a desk.
Ron is struggling with the task of jinxing Harry under Snape's supervision.
